snippet.title: The Cecil: The Journey Begins Game Trailer [Steam]
snippet.description:
Demo out now on steam! 🔔 *** Sub and turn on video notifications***
🏆 Steam: https://shorturl.at/etz48
🎮 Twitter: https://twitter.com/Genie_IntGames
🌎 Website: https://genieinteractive.com/


ABOUT THIS GAME
Experience survival horror with this brand new installment of - The Cecil: The Journey Begins.

👀👀👀 DEMO 2.0 is coming with 2 different endings and more gameplay 👻 We love you all just for the support! YOU ROCK!

First-Person Action – Players take on the role of John and experience a spine chilling battle of terrifying pursuit through dark hallways a first-person perspective.

Scary and unusual foes: get up close and personal with creepy monsters and tall metal screamers lurking in the halls, leaving you terrified around every corner.

Fast-paced gameplay: Fight enemies in shooter-style battles, explore dangerous rooms, solve fast-paced puzzles to get to new areas, and use things in the world to escape your fate.

High-Resolution Environments - High resolution environments with adjustable settings



ABOUT:

"The Cecil" is a chilling and suspenseful video game that will keep you on the edge of your seat. Join John and Sarah as they venture to the eerie and mysterious Cecil Hotel for a romantic getaway.

However, their dream vacation turns into a nightmare when they fall asleep, and John wakes up locked in a dark cell. As he struggles to find a way out, he realizes that Sarah is missing, and he must find her before it's too late.

Players will join John on his harrowing journey through the twisted corridors of the Cecil Hotel, navigating through a maze of creepy and disturbing rooms. Along the way, John will encounter all sorts of horrors, from shadowy figures lurking in the corners to strange noises and eerie whispers.

As you guide John through the hotel, you must use your wits and strength to defeat the twisted mysteries that stand in your way. You'll need to solve mind-bending puzzles and uncover hidden secrets to help John uncover the truth behind Sarah's disappearance and escape from the clutches of the hotel's dark and mysterious past.

With stunning graphics and immersive gameplay, "The Cecil" is the ultimate horror experience for players who crave mystery, suspense, and terror. Can you help John unravel the mystery of




🔴*** ABOUT THE CHANNEL***
"Founded in 2019, Genie Interactive Games embarked on an ambitious journey to revolutionize the gaming industry. With a strong focus on innovation and creativity, the company began development on its debut title in 2021, which showcased their dedication to delivering unique and immersive gaming experiences. Recognizing the importance of fostering a collaborative and dynamic workspace, Genie Interactive Games soon established its own state-of-the-art creators' studio. This cutting-edge facility, specifically designed to encapsulate a game-themed environment, provides the ideal atmosphere for developers, artists, and designers to collaborate seamlessly and bring their visionary projects to life."

💡 TOPICS IN THIS VIDEO 💡
• #horrorgames #videogames #gaming

🔎 HASHTAGS 🔎
##horrorgames#videogames#gaming
